title: For my true love
creator_credit: Russell Varney, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: When Russell and Wendy were both diagnosed with HIV they resolved to lean on each other as they feared discrimination. Eventually they reached out to organisations like Straight Arrows and started to feel alive again.
